title: Doll Outfit to Fit American Girl Dolls, Only $9.95!
content:
Wow! Get the doll outfit featured for only $9.95 at Amazon–save 60%! The outfit is made to fit 18″ dolls, which is the same size as American Girl dolls. Shipping is free with Amazon Prime or a $35 qualifying purchase. Prices at Amazon change without warning. Go now before the sale price is gone! Doll Clothes Denim […]
